projects.title: FitFolio
projects.description: FitFolio is a modern web application designed to connect fitness enthusiasts with professional trainers. Users can browse trainers, book classes, manage schedules, and make secure payments â€” all within a clean, intuitive interface. Trainers can manage their classes and slots, while admins oversee the platform.
keyFeatures: Separate dashboards and permissions for Users, Trainers, and Admins.
Real-time payment confirmation and booking status updates.
Monitor bookings, payments, and user activities.
Manage user roles and platform content.
View analytics: total revenue, recent transactions, user growth.
projects.challenges: Implementing a secure booking and payment system was complex, and ensuring real-time schedule updates for trainers and clients required careful database design.
projects.improvements: I plan to add in-app chat, personalized fitness analytics, and push notifications to boost client engagement.

projects.title: MathMatter
projects.description: MathMatter is an interactive web app that makes learning mathematics engaging through practice tools, problem sets, visualizations, and progress tracking.
keyFeatures: Filter blogs by category or title using query parameters.
Rank blogs by length of description for easy discovery.
Add, edit, delete, and comment on blogs with real-time updates.
Motion animations and tooltips enhance user experience.
projects.challenges: Designing an intuitive UX for complex math interactions was tricky. Handling large sets of practice problems and ensuring smooth performance required optimization.
projects.improvements: Future plans include adding gamification features, advanced analytics for progress tracking, and integrating AI-based practice recommendations.

projects.title: StoveStories
projects.description: StoveStories is a vibrant recipe book website that empowers users to share, explore, and save recipes, connecting food lovers through cooking stories.
keyFeatures: User-generated recipes with images, preparation times, and categories.
Like, edit, or delete recipes with real-time updates.
Personalized recipe collections filtered by user ID.
Integrated tooltips and animations for enhanced user experience.
projects.challenges: Managing real-time updates and data consistency across multiple users was challenging. Implementing secure authentication and authorization also required careful planning.
projects.improvements: In the future, I plan to add a social feed, advanced search filters, and integration with third-party recipe APIs to expand the recipe database.
